msIdentifier.idno: Oxford, Sackler Library, Papyrology Rooms P. Oxy. 3382

p.term: neat and upright, small capitals slightly slant right

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Submit - Removed superfluous characters following milestone
Finalized - Ready; added CWKB 2691 for Historiae, as well.
Submit - Corrected typo in bibliography entry (95468 > 95408)

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Some corrections needed. TEXT: restore Mironczuk’s reading for the first four lines of the column and remove lostlin markup at column beginning (1. [ταῦτα μὲν δὴ οὕτω λέγεται] 2. [γενέσθαι· οἱ δε Ἑλλήνων ἐς] 3. [τὸν ναυτικόν στρατὸν ταχ] 4.- [θέντες ἦσαν οἵδε, Ἀθην]αίο[ι]); l.1 insert comma after οἵδε; ll. 2-3 remove |ed| markup; l.3 dot iota of second καὶ and add grave accent to ὑπὸ; l.8 remove |ed| markup; in l. 12 I would remove the |ed| markup (the only interesting form is σφιν vs. the mss. σφι, but this is not really a novel reading); remove |ed| markup in ll. 13-14; in ll. 14-15 add accent to δυοκαίδεκα and remove |ed| markup; remove |ed| markup in l.18. In general, the list should be punctuated with commas throughout and all lines should be renumbered following the restoration of column beginning; 27 lines missing at column end. In col. ii renumber missing lines (twelve missing initially, 34 missing afterward) and renumber extant lines as 1 and 2, respectively. Insert punctuation (raised dot) after Λακεδαιμονίους. Make sure line numbers precede lost.?lin markup in both columns. META: remove volume number from biblio 9607; insert 95468 pp. 230-231 into biblio; remove 82308 from biblio entirely; update link to online image (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH011d/313d0b27.dir/POxy.v0048.n3382.a.01.hires.jpg); change display name to P.Oxy. 48 3382 and remove legacy name; Herodotus is CWKB 915; add passage details 8.1.1-2 to Author & Work section; MP3 is 480.2; correct spelling of Oxyrhynchus in provenance and add Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983); under physical description there are 2 columns and 48 lines per column. Simplify (if not remove) the two points of commentary; by adding Mironczuk to the bibliography they are accounted for.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Some corrections needed. TEXT: restore Mironczuk’s reading for the first four lines of the column and remove lostlin markup at column beginning (1. [ταῦτα μὲν δὴ οὕτω λέγεται] 2. [γενέσθαι· οἱ δε Ἑλλήνων ἐς] 3. [τὸν ναυτικόν στρατὸν ταχ] 4.- [θέντες ἦσαν οἵδε, Ἀθην]αίο[ι]); l.1 insert comma after οἵδε; ll. 2-3 remove |ed| markup; l.3 dot iota of second καὶ and add grave accent to ὑπὸ; l.8 remove |ed| markup; in l. 12 I would remove the |ed| markup (the only interesting form is σφιν vs. the mss. σφι, but this is not really a novel reading); remove |ed| markup in ll. 13-14; in ll. 14-15 add accent to δυοκαίδεκα and remove |ed| markup; remove |ed| markup in l.18. In general, the list should be punctuated with commas throughout and all lines should be renumbered following the restoration of column beginning; 27 lines missing at column end. In col. ii renumber missing lines (twelve missing initially, 34 missing afterward) and renumber extant lines as 1 and 2, respectively. Insert punctuation (raised dot) after Λακεδαιμονίους. Make sure line numbers precede lost.?lin markup in both columns. META: remove volume number from biblio 9607; insert 95468 pp. 230-231 into biblio; remove 82308 from biblio entirely; update link to online image (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH011d/313d0b27.dir/POxy.v0048.n3382.a.01.hires.jpg); change display name to P.Oxy. 48 3382 and remove legacy name; Herodotus is CWKB 915; add passage details 8.1.1-2 to Author & Work section; MP3 is 480.2; correct spelling of Oxyrhynchus in provenance and add Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983); under physical description there are 2 columns and 48 lines per column. Simplify (if not remove) the two points of commentary; by adding Mironczuk to the bibliography they are accounted for.

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.12 by Jesse Obert. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: “Completed for a Todd Hickey's class. Originally submitted on December 1st, but bounced due to a technical issue.“

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.12 by Jesse Obert. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: “Completed for a Todd Hickey's class. Originally submitted on December 1st, but bounced due to a technical issue.“

div.ab:
ταῦτα μὲν δὴ οὕτω λέγεται
γενέσθαι· οἱ δε Ἑλλήνων ἐς
τὸν ναυτικόν στρατὸν ταχ
θέντες ἦσαν οἵδε, Ἀθηναῖοι
μὲν νέας παρεχόμενοι ἑκα
τὸν καὶ εἴκοσι καὶ ἑπτά ὑπὸ
δὲ ἀρετῆς τε καὶ προθυμίης
Πλαταιέες ἄπειροι τῆς ναυ
τικῆς ἐόντες συνεπλήρουν
τοῖσι Ἀθηναίοισι τὰς νέας
Κορίνθιοι δὲ τεσσεράκοντα
νέας παρείχοντο, Μεγαρέες
δὲ εἴκοσι. καὶ Χαλκιδέες
ἐπλήρουν εἴκοσι, Ἀθηναί
ων παρεχόντων σφιν τὰς
νέας, Αἰγινῆται δὲ ὀκτω
καίδεκα, Σικυώνιοι δὲ δυο
καίδεκα, Λακεδαιμόνιοι
δὲ δέκα, Ἐπιδαύριοι δὲ ὀκ
τὼ, Ἐρετριέες δὲ ἑπτὰ, Τροιζή
νιοι δὲ πέντε, Στυρέες δὲ

item.p: See Mirończuk (2012), p. 230 for the reconstruction of the two columns.
